projects.name: KhunLook Mobile App
projects.details: Developed API routes using Fastify and designed MySQL database schema for streaks and badges system in KhunLook, an app to help parents monitor children's growth, development, and health from birth to age six. In collaboration with the Ministry of Public Health and other universities.

projects.name: Meet & Feat
projects.details: Developed user and authentication service for Meet & Feat, a platform for discovering and joining events and clubs in Chula as term project. Demoed and presented to instructors as a term project, resulting in an A grade. Made with NestJS, Drizzle, and Google OAuth. Deployed on GCP.

projects.name: Action Plan Announcer LINE Chatbot
projects.details: Chatbot for announcing action plan (scheduled tasks) during a long large-scale event. Used by 120+ staff during an actual event, resulting in an increased accuracy of executing tasks on time. Made with Typescript, Node, Express, Next.js, Tailwind, MongoDB, and LINE API. Deployed on Vercel, GCP, and Mongo Atlas.

projects.name: Nong Little LINE Chatbot
projects.details: Gemini-Powered Chatbot that replies positive message based on input and sends daily motivational quote to support mental health. Made with FastAPI (Python) and LINE API.

projects.name: Byenior
projects.details: Website for sending and receiving customizable letters between Intania 104 students. Made with Typescript, Bun, Next.js, Tailwind, Supabase, and Prisma. Deployed on Vercel.

projects.name: Magic Within
projects.details: Led a team of developers to develop an interactive website for users to overcome self-doubt. Animations, transitions, sounds, and interactive minigames is integrated. Made with Typescript, Bun, Next.js, Tailwind, and Framer Motion. Deployed on Vercel.

projects.name: Skillbridge
projects.details: Website for finding part-time jobs for students with a complete user flow starting from applying to receive wages. Made with Typescript, Node, Next.js, Tailwind, NextAuth, PostgreSQL, and AWS S3

projects.name: CUatEvent
projects.details: Event management and discovery platform for clubs in Chulalongkorn using React and Firebase. Developed with a team of 6 people in Thinc. 10 Days Project.

projects.name: RPG Chess
projects.details: A 2D desktop game where chess pieces have HP and various attacks and abilities implemented using OOP. Demoed and presented to instructors as a final term project, resulting in an A grade. Made with Java and JavaFX.

awards.name: Top 35 in GHB Open Innovation Hackathon 2025
Top 32 in Thailand Online Competitive Programming Contest
1st & 2nd International Olympiad in Informatics Camp Participant
awards.details: - Ranked 8th out of 25 in the 1st Camp

awards.name: Silver medal in the 16th Thailand Olympiad in Informatics (TOI16)

technologies.details: C/C++, Python, Java, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, Node.js, SQL, Go
React, Next.js, Vue.js, NextAuth, Tailwind, MaterialUI, shadcn/ui, Express.js, NestJS, MongoDB, Postgres, Prisma, TypeORM, Drizzle, tRPC, GraphQL, LINE API, Astro
AWS, GCP, Linux, Firebase, Vercel, Git, GitHub, Docker, Kubernetes, RabbitMQ, ngrok, Appsmith, Figma, Jira
OOP, Data Structures & Algorithms, REST API, gRPC

details: Learned microfrontend and microservice architecture, and software development process as a large enterprise tech company.
Contributed in audience data import and chat feature in MyCustomer using Vue.js and Go.
Fixed potential vulnerabilities in LINE OA Plus using input sanitization.
Developed Planner Hub, a study planner with personalized daily tasks, to-do lists, and weekly progress tracking, launched in TCASter app.
Developed MyPath+, customizable 3-year study planner with milestone tracker for high school students.
Aims to help students organize their exam preparation consistently and achieve academic goals. Made with React, NestJS, and GraphQL.

workExperiences.company: Japan Advanced Institute of Science and Technology (JAIST) in Ishikawa, Japan
details: Researched Secure Software Development Surveying at Japan with financial support from the institute
Categorized coding practices, OWASP, and CWE guidelines based on implementation steps
Worked with the team of developers, QA engineers, and product owners based on Scrum process
Developed new pages for the corporate web with dynamic content and responsive using React and MUI and tested using Cypress.
Contributed to developing and testing Thai Stock Order and Thai Stock Account services using Go and MySQL
Developed Shon-ma!, a dating app that allows users to match with others in the same bar using LINE Beacon for location detection.
The app also includes an auto-delete chat history, notifications, and gifting system. Made with Express, Next.js, Firebase, and LINE API
Tested by 50 users on pitching day and later interviewed in LINE Developer Thailand's podcast and a Medium blog.
Prepared and converted raw data to CSV for an orientation website with 40,000+ visitors using Python.

Developed and designed SQL database, admin tool, and Node.js server with CRUD, input validation, and file uploading for Intania Run website with 4,200+ registrants using Express, Postgres, Prisma, and Appsmith.

Led a 12-person Operation team in Intania Hackathon. Organized mentoring sessions, mini-hack, final pitching, and opening/closing ceremonies. Developed real-time scoring system to boost engagement on activities.
Led a team of developers and designers to develop a project tracking website to facilitate the internal document process in the organization using Next.js, Tailwind, NestJS, and PostgreSQL.
Planned and supervised the registration process from 1,335 applicants via the website to 300 final participants.
Recruited and led a team of 20, organized and distributed tasks among the team, created a collaborative environment, and guided team members during the preparation and execution phases.
Developed new features in the registration website using PostgreSQL, Spring, and React.
An interactive website that lets users remind themselves of their goals and memories in the past to create self reflection and discover their beings. Made with NextJS, Framer Motion, and Tailwind.
Gained 11,000+ visitors and 3,000 feedbacks over 3 months with an average rating of 4.4/5.

certificates.head: Certified in Cybersecurity (2025)
certificates.details: International Information System Security Certification Consortium (ISC2)
